articles.author: Hollie Geraghty
articles.title: The US 'Office' is getting a reboot and fans are worried - NME
articles.description: A reboot of the US Office is reportedly in the works as the writers' strike looks set to end, and fans of the show are not happy.
articles.content:
A reboot of the US Office is reportedly in the works, and fans of the show are not happy.
Yesterday (September 25) it was announced that the months-long Writers Guild of America (WGA) strike in Holl… [+3084 chars]
